name: Good Harvest Tomato
description:
Our very own range of SL-GAP (SL- Good Agricultural Practices) Certified Vegetables and Fruits. Rich in antioxidant - lucopene. Promotes heart health; anti-cancer; blood pressure control; helps and improves blood clotting, bone health and tissue growth. Contains - Vitamin: C (high), A (high), B6
Minerals: Calcium, Iron, Magnesium.  Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only. Actual product may slightly defer. Our team at Cargills Online takes every step to ensure to maintain the accuracy of all information displayed. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
